Articles.Content:
Here is a cinematic that I've been working on for the past few weeks. This is only the first part of what I hope will be more.

It is about the first mission to Jool, and, the first mission to head off to Vall. This is what I have so far, my video editing software was starting to freeze due to the length!

AND PART TWO:

And now, here is a trailer for Part 3....the kraken will be coming into the story soon!

Edit: I've completed part three for your enjoyment:

Edit: Part IV is, after a ridiculously long sabbatical that may or may not have been due to a boatload of exams, finally completed and uploaded!!

Please let me know what you think!

Universe

Edited May 12, 2014 by Universe

Man, now I can't use the name 'Vall Report' for my AAR!

Jokes aside, that's pretty awesome. The solar panel mishap was intense, I almost didn't think Jeb was gonna make it!

Thanks! The Aerobraking scenes were some of my favorite to do.

I'm currently working on part two....maybe I'll discover what vallhenge REALLY is....who knows!

I've uploaded part two as of now!

I do intend on making more...the last seconds may hint of what is yet to come!!

Let me know what you think.

Universe

Here is a quick bump! I've added a trailer for the up and coming part 3 of Vall report!

Let me know what you think! Constructive criticism is welcome, just please don't rip me to shreds!

I've been trying my hand at blender recently, and animated a few scenes in the trailer.

Universe

Here is another bump! Part three has, after a VERY long time, been completed and uploaded!

So far, I've spent about one hour per minute of footage....let me know if something needs improving!

Universe

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAND bump!!!!

Part IV has now been uploaded, as exams are done and school is out! Apologies for the loooooong period between episodes.

Please let me know what you think! I want to make the fifth and final episode (part V) as good as it can be!

Thanks for watching,

Universe
